document.heading: Dignity for Homeless Families Amendment Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-212, the “Dignity for Homeless Families Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-767. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Oct. 28, 2014, and Nov. 18, 2014, respectively. Returned without the Mayor’s signature on Dec. 13, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-516 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-212 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
